writer.name: 谢尔盖·奥夫查罗夫 Sergei Ovcharov

director.name: 谢尔盖·奥夫查罗夫 Sergei Ovcharov

introduction: Men stole from the basement of the main depot of table wine barrel, but failed to bring her home. Have not kept a barrel on the hill and in front of numerous witnesses, she fell into a river. All attempts to get her out of the water failed.I had to call for help has come recently from service a soldier. He tried to dive, but nothing happened. Then the soldier, who is accustomed to unexpected difficulties, made from cow skins balloon. Hitched to a rope and a barrel, the ball swept her along out of the water higher and higher into the sky carrying.
